rComments: I really enjoyed the class.  It was pretty easy and the massive curve made it an easy A. There were a lot of really dumb people in the class who complained about the exams being "super hard" and whatnot but the tests were simple multiple choice. The only downside to Dr. Anderson is that she talks way to fast, BUT,she will repeat things if asked.

She is an extremely kind and genuine person and very passionate about the ocean. However, her exams were extremely difficult. They should not have been so difficult since the lectures weren't very helpful. She wasn't the clearest professor.

This class is very unorganized and Clarissa talks VERY fast. She is hard to keep up with and does a poor job of explaining the material. She is very nice and I think she tries to be a good professor, but I would not recommend this class.

This is my major and I had a difficult time keeping up. She talks so fast in lecture it's almost pointless to take notes but she uploads the powerpoints anyways. Twice when I asked for help she directed me to the TAs. Easy class for me but I know some that struggled. Gives HUGE study guides for midterm and final.
